title: Oat pancakes with raspberries and honey
description: Think of these rather like the oatcakes you might have with cheese, only in pancake form; as with regular fluffy pancakes, however, it is what you eat with them that creates the magic. Here, I’ve made a honey and raspberry syrup, and the mixture of the soft, oaty cakes, the honey and the raspberries has a decidedly Scottish flavour.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz oat milk, or any other sort you wish
